title: libraryoftrader1
author: libraryoftrader1
content: "Library of Trader, formerly known as BestForexStore, was founded in 2015. This is a Group Buying platform that specializes in Trading, Investing, and Cryptocurrency education. We offer unique online courses, free downloading resources, and a wide selection of membership levels. Our mission is to make Library of Trader a reliable and informative community for traders to learn without being spammed or scammed at the most affordable prices. Customers' privacy and intellectual property rights are our top priorities. We guarantee our Group Buying products to be legal and copyright-compliant. By working with well-known authors from around the world, we hope to expand our collection of high-quality online courses for traders like you. But if you're able to afford it, we recommend purchasing the courses from the original sales pages so you can get their direct support.Contact information Library of Trader:Address: Eunos Techpark 60 Kaki Bukit Place, SingaporeEmail: support@libraryoftrader.com Website: https://libraryoftrader.net/Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/libraryoftrader/Twitter: https://twitter.com/libraryoftraderYoutube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtSpzSc2kwwU5vIWO4Kv_wA"

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: 1. What guarantee is there that once someone made payment, you would deliver the promised and product and not just run away with someone's money?2. You said you were formerly known as BestForexstore. Which domain exactly?- bestforex.store or bestforexstore.com?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Actually, almost all reviews from Trustpilot are fake all reviews are excellent which is an obvious use for marketing purposes. Also, the amount of sold courses/books are fake since you are using the Bookworm Woocommerce theme you can easily edit those sold value. So how can people trust you if you are trying to lie in the first place?Anyway, newbie traders can easily learn without spending money by research or using this link.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: Quote from: libraryoftrader1 on June 10, 2022, 07:57:24 AMOur mission is to make Library of Trader a reliable and informative community for traders to learn without being spammed or scammed at the most affordable prices. Customers' privacy and intellectual property rights are our top priorities. How can you mission giving a course for a trader without get scammed while you're the scammer who offered this poor course? How can customers privacy guaranteed on your site while we need to sign up? you're recording our IP address, device, password, email etc. That's not protect any customers privacy, but you're collecting customers privacy. Moreover if someone using his credit card or bank account, he doesn't have any privacy anymore.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: You obviously don't look serious. You posted first post after signing up and never made attempt to respond to doubts raised from your thread. I checked your login time today which is not quite long from the time of writing, so why have you not come up with response so far to all the doubts expressed. Newbie accounts are never to be trusted not when they come with stuffs as the op.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Then I see no reason why these 'well-known authors you've worked with' wouldn't vouch for your service in their official handles. In fact, it's normal for authors to link where people can buy their works.It's one way to make people less skeptic about your service. I highly suggest it.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: I doubt that this well sell like pancakes. There are so many doing online courses for free. Why would some purchase a non established website? As I see the social media, only few on their audience, means they are not doing well when it comes to marketing.There is non progressive approach on these books which probably a revision or copy cat of famous books out there. Plus theres no trust on lying to the people.
